channel.title: How do I play RSCD?
channel.description:
Alright before I get a bunch of crap saying I'm a 'Newb,' and Whatnot. I was playing servers, maybe 2 days at the most after they first ever came out. I started making my own servers, But after some years I decided to play RuneScape again, Until BH came out.
I have just found out (And seen vids on YouTube) about RSCD, and want to know if one is able to play it, without having to be sent an invite? Or if there is a simple and fast way to get an invite?
Basically I'm asking, Is there a client or something I could download in order to play RSCD?
Or is there a post with information, Answering my questions?
Thanks, - RuneScapeGP.

item.title: How do I play RSCD?

item.description:
@CODES_PLEAse wrote:

Ugh just go to some random server post and actually reg and dl their client.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I play RSCD?
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_pjers_i i_pk_pjers_i
item.description:
@i_pk_pjers_i wrote:

[quote=“Controlkill, post:4, topic:220035”]Yeah I ment RSCDameon, And Fuck!

Are there any RSC servers like it or was it like, one of a kind, unique?

Can’t believe I have almost maxed out pure on RS and a 117 main, Yet I’ld rather play a private RSC server, God I hate Jagex, so… so much.

P.S

http://www.piruonline.eu/, Much like my erectile tissue, Doesn’t work? :s[/quote]try other servers in the rsc advertisement section.

Read full topic
